attributes.action: include all signatures of various petitions against smoking ban as one single petition
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: wdold it not be simple to combine all petitions against smoking ban into one single petition? then we could see the opinion of the public in a true light.because let us not forget that in the original manifesto smoking was to be allowed in non-food establishments.i can guarantee that proper "pubs" not mass produced buisness run "bars" will suffer,does the pm want to see the end of the country boozer? just like the village shops and post offices? open your eyes before it is to late for the likes of us and the rest of our profession,we sell beer we are not policemen.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
